content: both cozy and sophisticated the country weekend shawl is a quick knit it features a five-inch wide staghorn cable spine framed by ribbed fabric the finished piece is texture-rich cuddly and cloud-like wrap it up snugly around your neck or tuck it under your coat samples shown dimond laine big birdie in colors butter mint and pout *a note on butter mint it is a light minty green in the photographs we took outdoors it s reading icy blue isn t it a shapeshifter of a shade sizes one size finished measurements approx 68 / 173 cm wingspan x 24 / 60 cm deep along spine yarn requirements please note these are yarn estimates the amount used will depend on yarn your personal gauge and any modifications you make dimond laine big birdie 79% alpaca 21% silk 174 yards per 100g 3 skeins or aran-weight yarn in the following amounts 470 yards / 430 m needles needles listed are suggested gauge needle us 10 6mm 32 / 80 cm circular needle tools 4 markers cable needle optional darning needle gauge 12 sts and 18 row = 4 / 10 cm in k1 p1 ribbing using gauge needle after blocking
